summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services. It details charges related to a shipment made on November 13, 2002, and includes information about customs fees and delivery details.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for shipping services provided by FedEx.

persons.name: COTRIN
persons.context: COTRIN is mentioned as the shipper associated with the shipment referenced in the invoice.

persons.name: MRS SHERMAN
persons.context: MRS SHERMAN is listed as the recipient of the shipment sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein.

MRS SHERMAN is the recipient of a shipment sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein.

events.title: Shipment Sent

events.title: Invoice Issued
events.description: FedEx issued an invoice to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 7-152-41155, dated November 21, 2002.
The total charges for the shipment amount to $137.13.
The shipment was sent on November 13, 2002, and delivered on November 10, 2002.
Customs fees and duties were included in the total charges of the invoice.
The invoice indicates that charges were paid to French Customs on behalf of Jeffrey E. Epstein.
